fields.description: Displayed when a user joins an auction.                             {user} is replaced by the username.
Displayed when a user leaves an auction.                             {user} is replaced by the username.

fields.text: Completion 100% ! Auction will start in a few seconds.
{perc}% of bids placed. I'm lowering the time frame to {secs} seconds. Auction will resume in 15 seconds.
fields.description: Displayed when a completion threshold is                                reached. {perc} is replaced by the completion                                percentage and {secs} by the new time                                frame.

fields.text: {user} has bid for the right to purchase the product at {price}
fields.description: Displayed when a user claims for a product playing for ITEMS

fields.text: {user} has bid for the right to win the retail value of the item in tokens.
fields.description: Displayed when a user claims for a product playing for TOKENS

fields.text: {user} won the auction for tokens. If {user} had played for items he/she could have purchased it for ${price}!
fields.description: Displayed when the auction for tokens finishes.                            {user} is replaced by the username.

fields.text: {user} won the auction! {user} has now the right to purchase this item at ${price}!
fields.description: Displayed when the auction for itmes finishes.                            {user} is replaced by the username.
